post:
Hi all,

We would like to offer 60% discount for all of our Cpanel shared hosting plans in Hungary.

All plans have daily backups (you can restore it yourself). We using HP Proliant servers, and 1 GBit/s uplink. Multiple PHP versions also available.

Our location is DMCA free!

**_Shared hosting plans:_**

**LH HU/Unl-Unl**

* Unlimited Domains
* Storage for 100000 files
* Unlimited bandwith
* **Free .top or .xyz domain name** (only for annually billing cycle)
* Discount price: 6.01 USD / quarterly
* [Order link](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&language=English&pid=6&promocode=CPANEL60&tld=.xyz)

**LH HU/20-Unl**

* Unlimited Domains
* 20 GB Disk Space
* Unlimited bandwith
* Discount price: 4.07 USD / quarterly
* [Order link](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&language=English&pid=3&promocode=CPANEL60)

**LH HU/5-Unl**

* Unlimited Domains
* 5 GB Disk Space
* Unlimited bandwith
* Discount price: 4.07 USD / semiannually 
* [Order link](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&language=English&pid=2&promocode=CPANEL60)

**_Reseller plan_:**

**LH HU/RE-10**

* 10 GB Disk Space
* 200 GB Bandwidth
* Overselling allowed
* Discount price: 2.17 USD / mo
* [Order link](https://my.mikrovps.hu/cart.php?a=add&language=English&pid=232&promocode=CPANEL60)

More reseller plans available on our websites: https://www.mikrovps.hu/en/resellers/cpanel
